code: public <Request extends ActionRequest, Response extends ActionResponse, RequestBuilder extends ActionRequestBuilder<Request, Response>> void execute(final Action<Response> action, final Request request, ActionListener<Response> listener) {     final TransportActionNodeProxy<Request, Response> proxy = proxies.get(action).     assert proxy != null : "no proxy found for action: " + action.     nodesService.execute((n, l) -> proxy.execute(n, request, l), listener). }
